import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Register ({ handleRegister }) { const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormValue({ ...formValue, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log('formValue', formValue) handleRegister(formValue) } return (
